channel.title: Notes on Leonid Gremyachikh
channel.description: Recent content in Notes on Leonid Gremyachikh

item.title: PyTorch Frameworks
item.description: Catalyst API Runner Runner – the logic of your deep learning experiment data model batch handling logic metrics monitoring systems. Callback The Callback API repeats main for-loops in our train-loop abstraction: on experiment start/end on batch start/end on stage start/end etc. Metric The Metric API. Logger Logger for metrics, images, hyper-parameters, etc. Can be connected with comet-ml and tensorboard. Engine The Engine sets how to run:

item.title: Segmentation models
item.description: TL; DR Сегментация это Если надо сделать то берешь последние модели: maskrcnn (такие плюсы такие минусы) … (такие плюсы такие минусы) Definitions Semantic segmentation – segment category, like car. Instance segmentation – segment individual instances, like Toyota Camry and Skoda Octavia. Panoptic Segmentation – Backbone – the feature extractor network. Then these features are upsampled by a simple decoder module of DeepLab models to generate segmented masks. (DeepLab term)

item.title: DL useful stuff
item.description: – the post is in process – git git fetch git rebase git checkout git merge git pull tmux terminal: tmux # start tmux session tmux ls # list sessions tmux a -t <session name> # attach to the session called <session name> tmux kill-session -t <session name> # kill the session called <session name> pkill -f tmux # just kill all tmux windows commands: CTRL+b c Create a new window CTRL+b n Switch to the previous window CTRL+b p Switch to the next window CTRL+b w Choose window from a list CTRL+b , Rename the current window CTRL+b & Kill the current window panes commands:

item.title: Computer vision 3D stuff
item.description: Mesh formats .obj etc Metrics chamfer distance cross entropy loss in PyTorch torch.nn.functional.cross_entropy(input, target) input: predicted unnormalized scores shape: (C), or (N, C), or (N, C, d1, d2, …, dk) with K>=1 in case of K-dimentioanl loss. target: ground truth class indices or class probabilities shape: (), or (N), or (N, d1, d2, …, dk) with K>=1 in case of K-dimentioanl loss. where C – number of classes; N – batch size.

item.title: CV
item.description: TODO: основные модели и задачи основные статьи мои статьи статью яндекса Модели крч надо заботать ML-IDS и про модели почитать доп модели diffusion models метрики слои повторить как оптимизация идет – sgd и тп attention transformers dalle, dalle2, imgen пару любимых статей как сейчас решается imgnet трансформеры attention
